TextView.android:text:
1.In the main screen, pick the first option scan a new image, or the second option to replay the last scan. 

2. Upon selecting the first option, you can either take a new picture, or open an existing one using the file explorer. 

3. After picking one of these options, you will be prompted to crop the image. Crop out any part that you don't wish to be scanned, and press the "crop" button. 

 4. You will receive a prompt to confirm whether or not you're happy with the result. Pressing "no" will let you try to crop the image once again. 

5. Upon confirmation, you can swipe up and either retry the process with a new image, or upload the cropped image to the server. 

6. Press "Upload image" to send the image to the server to be scanned. 

7. If the scan is successful, you will be sent an image of the scanned image, along with the MIDI file. 

 *You can find the finished MIDI file im your device's "downloads" folder*
